fullText: Mean Girls is a solid, entertaining musical that hits its marks without transcending them. It's fetch enough—but it could have been so much more.
dtliExcerpt: Mean Girls is a solid, entertaining musical that hits its marks without transcending them. It's fetch enough—but it could have been so much more.
